Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This exceptional item holds great value to us at $120, and we believe it could bring similar benefits to you. Considering its quality and functionality, I'm extending this opportunity to acquire it for $110. We're confident it will meet your needs and possibly even surpass your expectations. Please let me know if you're interested in exploring further or if you have any questions about the product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $110. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $110
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
